alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:42PM CDT until July 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 441 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Ware, or 13 miles north of Dalhart, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Ware and Conlen. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
